divs: Sighting DetailsAround Augist eigth me my sister and her husband were driving in the car in the middle of town. And when we stoped for gas and cigerattes for my sisters hisband my sister pointed out about 10-15 mysterious objects hovering in one direction. At first i thought they were ballons but then i realized they were moving to fast and to "Different" And when they were hovering the were very shifty. They didnt going in one direction exactly, they were moving side to side and almost tobling. I was always a believer in UFOs. But i never thought I would see one and i certinly never thought i were to see more then a twelve. I was in misbelife when i saw them. My brother in law and sister were also in misbelife. We kept looking at these "Objects" for about five minutes and while they were moving the started going behing a building that was in our line of sight.
Summary: Cloudy, Bubble Like, Moved in one direction but shifty.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Austintown
There were no other sightings in Austintown on or around August 8th 2011
